A

ArtifactResolver - Class in com.meltmedia.cadmium.maven
A simple way to get a url to download an artifact from a maven artifact vector.
ArtifactResolver(String, String) - Constructor for class com.meltmedia.cadmium.maven.ArtifactResolver
Sets up a basic ArtifactResolver that is backed by the specified remote maven repository.

Adds Services not included in the aether-impl.
